changelog.version:
July 12th, 2022 • Change: Reworked Loadouts, allowing up to 15 to be saved
• Bugfix: Restoration skill was applying to self combat instead of team combat
• Bugfix: A number of actions that had skill exp added to them weren't properly granting the exp
• Bugfix: Added descriptions of where each shortcut takes you to the tooltip

July 13th, 2022 • New Action Type: Trial - Trials are longer form dungeons, but without the soulstone gain
• New Trial (Merchanton): Heroes Trial - 50 floors. Grants Heroism buff per floor completed
• New Buff: Heroism - Grants 2% increased Combat, Pyromancy, and Restoration skill exp per level
• Bugfix: Rewrote soulstone sacrifice code
• Bugfix: The Spire was based on self-combat rather than team-combat
• Bugfix: Totem didn't effect Imbue Body until the third completion

July 12th, 2022 • 变化: 为神谕和礼仪学校增加一个行动上限
• 变化: 首次完成图腾会翻倍灌注躯体的奖励

July 12th, 2022 全局探索重做 - 还需要继续观察并且应该让探险家公会派上用场
• 变化: 探索将存在于所有区域并解锁于探险家公会
• 变化: 探索行动上限提高到 500, 但现在它是所有探索行动的共同上限
• 变化: 探索现在是有限行动, 你现在可以使用圆圈图标控制了
• Bug修复: 循环药剂的提示
• Bug修复: 空间魔法增加了魔法井的法力消耗

July 12th, 2022 • Change: Constructed additional warehouses so numbers would be prettier with all increases
• Bugfix: Player was falling asleep on the wagon, missing the merchantville stop, and ending up on the mountain
• Bugfix: Imbue soul wasn't resetting buffs
• Bugfix: Excursion costs weren't modified by explorers guild
• Bugfix: Key wasn't being reset correctly
• Bugfix: Underworld action was showing failed, even when successful
• Bugfix: Mana well and Buy mana tooltips now update when leveling skills that benefit them
• Bugfix: Skill rework was causing pick locks to give double gold
• Bugfix: Guided tour was being removed from active list on refresh

July 11th, 2022 • 新公会: 探索者 - 经过社区投票, 探索者在商业村庄开设了商店!
• 在所有区域解锁了一个新的 "探索" 行动 - 探索的进度会增加有限资源的上限 (% * 0.5)
• 全局的探索进度还为区域移动提供了更便捷的捷径
• Bug修复: 法力井消耗可能为负, 导致反而从玩家身上吸取法力
• Bug修复: 远行没有检查你是否有足够的金块开始
• Bug修复: Reputation display wasn't updated after fall from grace action
• Backend: Major rework of how skill bonuses are calculated in code. The results should be the same, but make the code easier to read and maintain. Unfortunately, I expect at least a few bugs from typos in this.

July 9th, 2022 • New Skill: Wunderkind - Increases talent exp gain
• New Action (Jungle Path): Totem - Consumes a looping potion to give Wunderkind skill Exp
• Change: Moved the Oracle skill to be next to Charm School
• Bugfix: Aspirant bonus was being applied to all exp gain, not just talent exp
• Bugfix: Gamble action gold was not rounding
• Bugfix: Removed reputation requirement from collect interest tooltip
• Bugfix: Removed "this does nothing" from Collect Artifacts
• Bugfix: Added the max quantity button to the Collect Artifacts action
• Removed versions from changelog >1 year old

July 7th, 2022 • New Action (Commerceville): Excursion - Exploration action to reveal other actions in the zone
• New Actions (Commerceville): Pick Pocket, Rob Warehouse, Insurance Fraud - Gold gain based on thieves guild bonus & thievery
• Finished implementation of thievery skill - Increases gold gain of pick locks, gamble, and thieves guild actions
• Added temporary effect for imbue soul - Adds 50% action speed per completion. Will likely be changed later
• Improved handling of bonus time on time-gated actions. Effective time used for these actions can be viewed in the "Mana Used" tooltip
• Bugfix: Donate allowed going negative on gold
• Bugfix: Collect interest was only rewarding 1/10th of the intended amount
• Bugfix: Excursion didn't cost gold
• Bugfix: Imbue Soul didn't have costs
• Bugfix: Thieves guild segments weren't resetting
• Bugfix: Great feast throwing an error
• Numerous updates and clarifications in various tooltips

July 6th, 2022 • New Zones - Jungle Path, Commerceville, and Valley of Olympus. Major milestones are implemented, with more content to come • New Buff: Imbue Body - Sacrifices talent exp to permanently raise starting stats.
• New Skill: Gluttony - Decreases the soulstone cost of great feast.
• New Skill: Thievery - Improves gold gain of certain actions
• New Action (Startington): Mana Well - Gives mana based on how quickly in the loop it is completed (adjusted for bonus second use)
• New Actions (Jungle Path): Explore Jungle & Fight Jungle Monsters - Generic exploration/progress action where exp is based on fight monsters completion
• New Actions (Jungle Path): Rescue Survivors & Prepare Buffet - Uses Resto skill, then herbs and hide to give Gluttony exp
• New Action (Jungle Path): Escape - Unlocks next zone, but requires being completed within 60 seconds of starting the loop (adjusted for bonus second use) • New Actions (Commerceville): Thieves Guild - Functions similar to crafting guild, but with a focus on gold income
• New Actions (Commerceville): Invest & Collect interest. Grants a small percentage of lifetime investments
• New Actions (Commerceville): Purchase Key & Leave City - Progress to next zone for cost of 1M gold
• New Actions (Valley Of Olympus): Imbue Soul & Challenge Gods - (Incomplete) Planned end of game
• Dark Ritual now works in all zones and provides a very minor speed increase up to max level. Need to find a way to hide description for locked zones
• Decreased mana cost of open rift from 100k -> 50k
• Minor fix to how Spatiomancy effects herbs

July 4th, 2022 • Added Build Housing and Collect Taxes actions in Valhalla - a new source of gold gain that uses Crafting Guild Rank and Mercantilism skill.
• Renamed Adeptsville to Startington
• Added Meander action in Startington and set as a requirement to see other actions
• Added Destroy Pylon action in startington to reduce the mana cost of spire
• Increased the base mana cost of The Spire significantly, mostly offset by destroying pylons
• Allowed Spatiomancy to benefit more actions
• Fixed Great Feast buff so it actually improves Self Combat
• Training mercantilism now costs reputation
• Fall From Grace now removes all positive reputation
• Tweaked Looping potion to require doubling herbs with spatiomancy in anticipation of end-game use
• Cleaned up a bunch more tooltips

June 24th, 2022 • The spire now gives rewards! It gives 100 soulstones per floor and well as aspirant ranks
• New Skill: Divine Favor. Increases soulstones gained from actions
• New Skill: Communing. Reduces soulstone costs of dark ritual
• New Buff: Aspirant. Increases talent xp multiplier
• New Action: Fight Giants - Self combat fight that increases the effectiveness of seek blessing
• New Action: Seek Blessing - Gives divine favor skill xp based on fight giants progress
• New Action: Raise Zombies - Increases team combat
• New Action: Dark Sacrifice - Gives communing skill xp
• Cleaned up a number of tooltips

March 18th, 2022 • Omsi's beta content! • Added Valhalla zone with numerous new actions - reachable with Face Judgement
• Added Adeptsville zone and The Spire dungeon - reachable with Face Judgement
• New Skill: Restoration - Improves team combat and effectiveness of Heal the Sick
• New Skill: Spatiomancy - Reduces mana gyser costs and increases possible rewards from zone 1 and 3 actions
• New Skill: Mercantilism - Increases gold received from Buy Mana actions
• New Buff: Great Feast - Increases self combat score
• More new actions than you can shake a stick at!
• Probably lots more stuff, too?

save.list_comment: 列表可以以纯文本形式导出，因此你可以和其他玩家分享你的列表
save.export_comment:
点击导出会把存档复制到剪贴板 (ctrl-v 粘贴到别的地方).
粘贴一个存档然后点击导入可以导入.
save.import_comment:
警告: 导入无效的存档会卡死. 空的导入会清除存档
如果你真的真的真的想编辑你的存档,
save.import_hover_special_tooltip:
In the console, use decode("pasted savefile"), edit, then encode('pasted savefile'), then import it
This is mainly for fixing broken savefiles - don't be a cheater.

q_a.a: 鼠标悬停在 "属性" 上可以查看. 属性的效果权值取决于你进行的行动.
以目前的平衡来说短循环效果更好, 尤其是早期游戏. 但当你开始大量获取灵魂石和天赋后, 长循环也许会更优秀.

q_a.q: 我的第一个目标是什么?
q_a.a: 去漫步直到你找到获得法力的途径. 然后尝试学习一些战斗技能使你获得永久的加成, 接着试着和怪物战斗!

options.adblock_warning: 警告: 由于一些原因, Adblock Plus可能导致严重卡顿. 这个游戏并没有广告, 所以如果你的游戏经常卡死, 请把它关掉.
options.hotkeys_tooltip:
空格: 暂停/继续
R: 重置
B: 启动奖励时间
1-5: 选择预存列表 1-5
Shift+1-5: 选择并立即加载预存列表 1-5
+/-: 增长/缩短行动列表长度
Shift+S: 把当前列表保存到预存列表
Shift+L: 加载当前预存列表
Shift+C: 清空当前列表
→/D: 显示下一个区域
←/A: 显示上一个区域
Shift+→/D: 显示行动故事
Shift+←/A: 显示行动选项
Shift+Z: 撤销对行动列表的上一次更改

body.tutorial:
教程:
点击漫步然后点击继续来开始.
漫步一小会, 然后就可以踢罐子了.
注意数字变化, 尽量阅读所有提示.
完成小镇, 然后进入下一个区域.

那边那个家伙, 你现在正在 omsi6.github.io 玩游戏.
在开始之前, 你应该知道这只是一个粉丝做的改版
想玩原版游戏, 地址是 . 原版的存档可以直接导入到
这边, 但你如果把这边的存档导入到原版, 你将会失去所有这个版本新增加的内容.

感谢游玩, 祝你玩得开心!

resource.title: 法力:
resource.desc: 你的主要资源. 你的法力越多, 你在重置前就能做越多的事.

resource.title: 金块:
resource.desc: 卖掉它换点法力, 或者在某些行动里使用它.

resource.title: 声望:
resource.desc: 小镇的人对你的看法.

resource.title: 草药:
resource.desc: 也许很有用的植物.

resource.title: 皮革:
resource.desc: 一次成功打猎的成果.

resource.title: 药水:
resource.desc: 稀有, 但并不复杂. 可以卖些钱.

resource.title: 队友:
resource.desc: 你非常了解他们的战斗风格和性格. 但他们甚至不知道你叫什么.

resource.title: 护甲:
resource.desc: 你亲手制作的, 它可以从危险中保护你.

resource.title: 血液:
resource.desc: 它的再生能力令它备受推崇. (目前没有用)

resource.title: 古董:
resource.desc: 各种旧戒指, 手镯, 护身符, 还有项链. 也许你能用它们赚一大笔钱.

resource.title: 支持度:
resource.desc: 你对关键人物真的很慷慨.

resource.title: 附魔护甲:
resource.desc: 神圣的武器和护甲, 就像英雄史诗里的那种.

resource.title: 住宅:
resource.desc: 在瓦尔哈拉建造的房子. 你可以向租户收租.

resource.title: 电缆塔:
resource.desc: 从损毁的电缆塔上回收的碎片.

resource.title: 僵尸:
resource.desc: 一群摇摇晃晃的尸体. 真恶心.
噢, 树上的叶子真多啊.
前往下一个镇子需要它们.
很重, 但是你会用到的.
一瓶和让你陷入循环的那瓶药非常相似的药水. 说真的你为什么要做这个?
你成为了光荣的瓦尔哈拉公民, 你现在有正当的理由为荣誉而战了.
长者天使翅膀的马. 它在云上跑起来就像在地上一样轻松.
前往下一个镇子会需要它的.

time_controls.restart_text: 重置循环. 并不是硬重置.

stories.story: 你是个普通的送货员, 正在运送一个相当高级的长途包裹. 就在你进入小镇时, 你滑倒了 - 摔坏了你的眼镜 - 而且包裹还摔开了, 一股奇怪的液体溅到了你身上. 瞬间, 你微薄的法力开始迅速消耗. 就在你法力耗尽的时候, 你发现你回到了 液体溅到你身上的瞬间, 你微薄的法力储备也充满了...虽然并没有比之前更多. 循环不断重复, 世界似乎也随之不断重置, 直到你下定决心找出延长循环的办法. 这个镇子似乎经常会把法力水晶存储到罐子里，也许你可以从那里开始...
你到达了地牢的终点, 一个散发着柔和光芒的球悬浮在踏板上, 你找到了地牢的核心 - 至少是地牢第一层的. 当你抓住它时, 它的精华注入了你的体内, 你似乎获得了它的力量. 虽然不多, 但这只是个小地牢. 你肯定还会再回来一遍, 那时又可以再摄取一次力量, 同时来自外域的知识也随之摄入, 这是永久保留的.
你再次到达了地牢的终点, 但这次这个核心并没有散发光芒. 你最开始以为这个核心的能量来源于周围的魔力, 但现在你发现你似乎以某种方式耗尽了它的精华. 这并不总是发生, 你只需要继续向世界释放魔力来为它充能. 你只能耸耸肩, 接受了这个奇怪的设定, 继续你的循环.
你成功了! 你赢得了锦标赛并获得了治疗. 你现在可以随时停止循环. 但, 好像你还有些东西想做... (游戏通关, 如果你想你可以继续玩).

bonus_seconds.title: 奖励时间
bonus_seconds.main_text:
当奖励开启, 你每秒额外获得 4 秒 (5x 速度).
离线或暂停时每秒可以获得 1 点奖励点. (离线奖励最多 1 个月)
奖励点有

con.blurb: 再长一点. 再多一点.

tooltip.explanation:
每级能力都会减少对应行动的法力消耗 1%.
天赋经验获取是能力经验的 1% , 并且循环不会重置它.
天赋可以给予能力经验 (1+(天赋等级)^0.4/3) 倍率加成.
一个行动能获得的经验是 (原始法力 / 当前法力) * (天赋加成) 每刻度.
总倍率等于天赋倍率乘灵魂石倍率.

举例：交朋友消耗800法力且属性比例为
Int
10%
Cha
80%
Soul
10%.
意思是其中80法力是
Int
, 另外 80 是
Soul
, 然后剩余的 640 是
Cha
.
如果你的
Cha
在行动开始时等级为 20 , 加成就是 x1.2 也就是实际法力消耗为 640 / 1.2 = 533.33
再加上
Soul
和
Int
的 160 法力消耗, 总行动消耗 (向下取整) 应该是 694, 也就是 ~87% 的总消耗.
行动将提供 (800/694)*(1+(天赋)^0.4/3) 经验每法力总计 694 法力.
tooltip.graph_legend:
点击传说以显示/隐藏它们.
在刚开始, 等级和天赋对游戏的影响很小.
悬停在能力上获取更多信息.

scombat.label: 个人战斗力
scombat.desc: 担任战斗力 = (战斗技能 + 火焰魔法 * 5) * (1 + (护甲 + 3 * 附魔护甲) * 制造工会倍率 / 5)

tcombat.label: 团队战斗力
tcombat.desc: 团队战斗力 = 个人战斗力 + (战斗技能 + 恢复技能 * 2) * (队友 / 2) * 冒险公会乘数

practical.label: 实用魔术
practical.desc: 魔法手, 变戏法, 侦测魔法, 以及一些其他实用的小魔法.
practical.desc2:
踢罐子和野生法力的法力消耗降低 初始消耗 / (1 + 等级 / 100) (向下取整).
1-200级每级使开锁获得 1% 额外金币 (向下取整).
101-300级每级使短任务获得 1% 额外金币 (向下取整).
201-400级每级使长任务获得 1% 额外金币 (向下取整).
当前使成本乘以
x.

alchemy.label: 炼金术
alchemy.desc: 熬制药水很辛苦! 幸运的是你找到了个好老师.
alchemy.desc2: 新手村的魔法师非常崇拜炼金术. 每级可以使魔法课程的魔法经验+1% (向下取整) .

dark.label: 黑暗魔法
dark.desc: 使用黑暗魔法来帮助你获得法力.
dark.desc2:
踢罐子和野生法力的法力获取乘以 (1 + 等级 / 60) ^ 0.25 (向下取整).
当前
x 倍法力获取.

crafting.label: 制造
crafting.desc: 使用双手和你的创造力做一些物理性质的工作.

chronomancy.label: 时间魔法
chronomancy.desc: 利用时间的魔法, 对, 加速时间.
chronomancy.desc2:
所有区域的行动速度加速 (1 + 等级 / 60) ^ 0.25 .
当前
x 速度.

pyromancy.label: 火焰魔法
pyromancy.desc: 火球术, 火焰爆破, 火墙, 喷射火焰, 名副其实的火爆组合!
pyromancy.desc2: 对个人战斗力有 5x 加成.

restoration.label: 恢复魔法
restoration.desc: 从小治疗术到复活术, 你肯定能用好它们.
restoration.desc2: 对团队战斗力有 2x 加成，并增强治病行动.

spatiomancy.label: 空间魔法
spatiomancy.desc: 谁能想到空间魔法竟然这么有用!
spatiomancy.desc2:
法力喷泉和法力井消耗降低 初始 / (1 + 等级 / 100).
1 - 500 每级使建造房屋增加 1% .
101-300 每级使锁住的房子增加 0.5% .
201-400 每级使短任务增加 0.5% .
301-500 每级使长任务增加 0.5% .
401-600 每级使森林中的动物增加 0.5% .
501-700 每级使可采集的草药增加 0.5% .
601-800 每级使好骗的人增加 0.5% .
701-900 每级使可采集的灵魂石增加 0.5% .
801-1000 每级使可获取的古董增加 0.5% .
901-1100 每级使需要捐款的人增加 0.5% .
1001-1200 每级使可以找到电缆塔的建筑增加 0.5% .
1101-1300 每级使能捡到的钱包增加 0.5% .
1201-1400 每级使可抢劫的仓库增加 0.5% .
1301-1500 每级使可诈骗的保险公司增加 0.5% .
当前可降低消耗
x.

mercantilism.label: 重商主义
mercantilism.desc: 和法力商人讲价以获得更好的价格.
mercantilism.desc2:
购买法力的法力量提高 (1 + 等级 / 60) ^ 0.25.
当前给予
x 法力量.

divine.label: 神恩术
divine.desc: 神回应了你的祈祷并授予了神恩.
divine.desc2:
行动获得的灵魂石增加 (1 + 等级 / 60) ^ 0.25.
当前给予
x 灵魂石.

commune.label: 黑暗神谕
commune.desc: 你的血祭使你与黑暗生物的沟通更加顺畅.
commune.desc2:
黑暗仪式的灵魂石成本降低 初始 / (1 + 等级 / 100).
当前成本倍率
x.

wunderkind.label: 神童
wunderkind.desc: 即使你闭着眼, 你还是能看到图腾的光辉.
wunderkind.desc2:
使灌注躯体的初始收益翻倍
天赋经验获取增加 (1 + 等级 / 60) ^ 0.25.
当前获取
x 天赋经验.

gluttony.label: 暴食
gluttony.desc: 丛林中永不满足的饥饿侵蚀了你.
gluttony.desc2:
盛宴灵魂石消耗降低 初始 / (1 + 等级 / 100).
当前消耗倍率
x.

thievery.label: 偷窃
thievery.desc: 进行一个财富的再分配.
thievery.desc2:
提高开锁, 赌博, 以及盗贼工会的金块获取 (1 + 等级 / 60) ^ 0.25.
当前给予
x 金块倍率.

tooltip.no_reset_on_restart: 技能持续时间直到重置.

dark_ritual.label: 黑暗仪式
dark_ritual.desc: 女巫感谢你对黑暗魔法的贡献. 每级使黑暗魔法行动的黑暗魔法经验 +1% (向下取整) .
dark_ritual.desc2:
1-20 每级使新手村的行动速度提高 10% .
21-40 每级使森林小径的行动速度提高 5% .
41-60 每级使商业小镇的行动速度提高 2.5% .
61-80 每级使奥林匹斯山的行动速度提高 1.5% .
81-100 每级使瓦尔哈拉的行动速度提高 1.0% .
101-150 每级使初始小镇的行动速度提高 0.5% .
151-200 每级使丛林小路的行动速度提高 0.5% .
201-250 每级使商业村庄的行动速度提高 0.5% .
251-300 每级使山谷的行动速度提高 0.5% .
301-666 每级使全局的行动速度提高 0.1% .

imbue_mind.label: 精神灌注
imbue_mind.desc:
使用灵魂石的力量, 你可以增强你的精神力.
每级使你能做的训练次数上限增加 1 且会加成一些其他行动.

imbue_body.label: 躯体灌注
imbue_body.desc:
献祭你积累的天赋, 你可以永久的提高自己的能力.
每次新的循环开始, 所有能力从躯体灌注的等级开始.

great_feast.label: 盛宴
great_feast.desc:
丰盛的盛宴使你整个循环都不会感到饥饿! 真是让人印象深刻的魔法.
每级使个人战斗力提高 5% . (向下取整)

aspirant.label: 野心家
aspirant.desc:
抵达尖塔新的高度使你的头脑和灵魂焕然一新.
每级使天赋经验获取提高 1% .

heroism.label: Heroism
heroism.desc:
Completing the trial fills you with determination.
Combat, Pyromancy, and Restoration Skill Exp gain increased by 2% per level.

imbue_soul.label: 灵魂灌注
imbue_soul.desc:
(未完成) 献祭所有东西以获得强大的加成.
每级使所有行动加速 50% (加法计算).

tooltip.no_reset_on_restart:
加成将持续到重置.
你可以右键点击来编辑它，并设置上限. (当加成抵达上限时行动会自动失败且不会消耗灵魂石)

town0.name: 新手村
town0.desc: 地下室里的老鼠、咄咄逼人的野猪、蹦蹦跳跳的史莱姆和喜欢诉说的陌生人都是你在新手村随处可见的东西. 有些人甚至没有戴头盔或者没有穿鞋子，但至少剑还是铁制的. 你很庆幸至少你是在一个体面的城市开始循环. 如果没有那些不允许你做危险的事的一大堆规矩，那就完美了.

town1.name: 森林小径
town1.desc: 仿佛永远是绿色的森林. 你感觉到了空气中有法力弥漫, 但它们的源头隐藏在黑暗中, 你还感觉到了一些邪恶的存在...

town2.name: 商业小镇
town2.desc: 商业小镇! 一个熙熙攘攘的普通小镇. 你可以在这里找到很多特殊建筑物, 像是图书馆, 冒险公会, 制造公会, 还有集市. 噢, 我差点忘了说了, 赌场里还有很多容易上当的家伙.

town3.name: 奥林匹斯山
town3.desc: 你可以去其他小镇, 但不! 你 必须 前往奥林匹斯山, 不是吗. 但不管怎么说, 当你来到这里, 只要你不是小狗或者老爷爷, 你就可以学到一些新的小技巧. 然后顺手杀死一些无辜的巨魔.

town4.name: 瓦尔哈拉
town4.desc: 一个到处都是美好事物的快乐城市. 维京人, 熊, 天使, 啤酒, 各种乱七八糟的东西, 还有啤酒! 你可以在大会堂里消磨时间, 或者前往城市的郊区. 不管你去哪, 你都肯定能度过一段愉快的时光.

town5.name: 初始小镇
town5.desc: 一个似曾相识的地方, 但这里遍布着匍匐的阴影和不详的气息. 在中心矗立着一个被乌云环绕的尖塔, 笼罩在昏暗的紫色光柱之下. 有 10 束紫光射向城镇周围, 似乎是那些阴影的源头. 也许你该去检查一下它们.

town6.name: 丛林小路
town6.desc: 一个扭曲的丛林，似乎要把你吸到深处.

town8.name: 奥林匹斯山谷
town8.desc: 形状就像被挖掉了一座山.

calculated_shattering.name: 精确击碎
calculated_shattering.desc:
训练你的击碎技巧以尽可能又快又好的踢罐子.
每级降低 1 的法力消耗.

no_frill_frames.name: 无边框眼镜
no_frill_frames.desc:
如果你愿意花点时间挑选一下眼镜, 你可以找到更便宜的镜框. 考虑到你可能不会用多久, 所以不会花费多少时间, 你只是单纯的觉得省点钱更好.
每级降低 1 的法力消耗.

tooltip.desc:
法力消耗基于能力倍率 %s.
获取的经验也是一样.
能力/天赋经验每个刻度都会获得.
技能经验除非另有规定，否则需要依赖完成对应行动来获得.
行动会优先检查未检查的部分, 除非你勾选了优先战利品.
tooltip.mana_used_explanation:
已包含能力对速度的影响.
每个行动完成后更新.
每轮结束时更新.
Effective time:
0
tooltip.repeat_last_action: 重复列表最后一个行动
tooltip.add_action_top: 把行动添加到列表最上方
tooltip.higher_done_percent_benefic: 随着 % 提高你可以找到更多内容.
tooltip.list_explanation:
拖动并放置行动可以重新排列它们.
右边的行动列表将会在下次重置后激活.
一秒 = 50 法力.
每个行动至少需要 1 刻度.
当行动列表没有行动剩余将自动重置.

surveyZ0.label: 调查
surveyZ0.tooltip:
探索者公会让你学到了许多非常容易错过的东西.
进度等于所有区域平均进度的平方根.
每个循环只能完成
500
次.
当前每次行动给予
经验.

surveyZ1.tooltip:
探索者公会让你学到了许多非常容易错过的东西.
进度等于所有区域平均进度的平方根.
每个循环只能完成
500
次.

经验.

经验.

surveyZ8.tooltip:
探索者公会让你学到了许多非常容易错过的东西.
进度等于所有区域平均进度的平方根.
每个循环只能完成

次.

经验.

wander.label: 漫步
wander.tooltip: 探索这个小镇, 寻找隐藏的区域和宝藏.
wander.story_1: 20% 探索度:⮀ 你大致了解了村庄的整体布局, 你至少不会在穿过村庄时迷路了!
wander.story_2: 40% 探索度:⮀ You're starting to really know your way around, you can almost figure your way around without following a set path!
wander.story_3: 60% 探索度:⮀ You've tread all the main roads and you avail yourself to the unkempt side paths and well worn paths. If you let yourself into some houses, well, no one needs to know, do they?
wander.story_4: 80% 探索度:⮀ You've decided to explore the houses now that you've trod every single feasible path in this small village. Man, the stuff people keep around.
wander.story_5: 100% 探索度:⮀ You've been everywhere, there is absolutely nowhere in this town you haven't been. You've been in every cellar, under every bed, and in every closet. You've pried all the floorboards, and just in general, been into everything. Except the houses with locks, those dastardly locks.

smash_pots.label: 踢罐子
smash_pots.tooltip:
它们就静静地站在那里, 完整, 富有潜力.
有法力的罐子里有
smash_pots.tooltip2:
法力.
每 10 个罐子有一个有法力.
smash_pots.story_1: 50 Pots with mana:⮀ You've smashed every single pot in this village, and have figured out all the pots that contain any trace of mana. Having to break them all physically was time consuming, and your skills at absorbing the mana weren't the best. There must be more efficient ways of doing it.

pick_locks.label: 开锁
pick_locks.tooltip:
别担心; 他们不会记得的.
有财物的房子里有
pick_locks.tooltip2:
金块.
每 10 个房子有一个有金块.
解锁于 20% 探索度.
pick_locks.story_1: House checked:⮀ You manage to pick a lock that was in disrepair and opened the door, only to walk into the home's inhabitant. Good thing the loop ended not soon after. You're gonna have to figure out which houses are worth hitting. Some money wouldn't go astray.
pick_locks.story_2: 50 Houses known:⮀ You really should look at hitting those locked houses around, who knows what goodies you'll manage to scrounge up.
pick_locks.story_3: 10 Houses with loot:⮀ You've figured out which houses are uninhabited and have enough gold for it to be worth your time. As they say, time is mana!

buy_glasses.label: 购买眼镜
buy_glasses.tooltip:
这不公平. 是时候了. 我总是需要它.
现在你需要花费 10 金块来买一副新眼镜!
在本次循环的剩余时间使漫步效果 4x .
对所有带有眼镜标记的行动生效
你只能进行 1 次购买眼镜行动.
解锁于 20% 探索度.
buy_glasses.story_1: Glasses bought:⮀ The world snaps into sharp focus as you put them on and you gawk a little as details that had slipped your eyes previously stood out in sharp contrast. You're a little gobsmacked at how much of a difference they make.

found_glasses.label: 找到眼镜
found_glasses.tooltip:
你发誓你肯定在什么地方准备了一副备用眼镜. 你几乎翻遍了世界的所有角落. 每个角落的秘密都被你挖掘出来. 你终于找到了它 - 在一个任何人都想不到的地方. 你的头上.
你现在总是戴着眼镜开始循环.

buy_mana_z1.label: 购买法力
buy_mana_z1.tooltip2:
法力. 尽可能的花掉所有金块购买.
解锁于 20% 探索度.

meet_people.label: 结识朋友
meet_people.tooltip:
只是简短的聊天他们是不会放你走的.
解锁于 22% 探索度.
meet_people.story_1: 1% People Met:⮀ You stand there, a little stumped at the situation you’ve gotten yourself into, when a young lass asks you about your day so far.
meet_people.story_2: 20% People Met:⮀ The people here are generally nice enough, if a bit brusque at times. Some people have small tasks that they're happy to pay for.
meet_people.story_3: 40% People Met:⮀ There are a surprising amount of people in the village. You didn’t catch that when you were looking around.
meet_people.story_4: 60% People Met:⮀ It almost seems that most people have something they want done, the real problem is figuring out whats worth your time.
meet_people.story_5: 80% People Met:⮀ Having met such a large portion of the people in this village, you almost feel guilty about stealing from them. Almost.
meet_people.story_6: 100% People Met:⮀ You've spoken to everyone. Every child, adult, teen, animal and plant in this village. Everyone, and everything.

train_strength.label: 训练力量
train_strength.tooltip:
锻炼肌肉. 再来一次.
获取经验/天赋的速度 4x , 每次循环只能执行
次行动.
解锁于 5% 已结识朋友.
train_strength.story_1: Strength trained:⮀ You lift the oak barrel filled with water, holding it while you squat again and again. The barrel rests upon your back as you do push up after push up. It's a trusty companion in your quest to regain your muscle.
train_strength.story_2: 100 Strength talent:⮀ Your body adapts faster and faster to the strains you put upon it. You know exactly how far to push it and can tell almost instinctively when to stop.
train_strength.story_3: 1,000 Strength talent:⮀ Your body seems to build itself up faster and faster each time you break it down. You can practically feel your mana purr in satisfaction as it rebuilds your body to be stronger and stronger.

short_quest.label: 短任务
short_quest.tooltip:
成为英雄! ...只要奖励合适且耗时不长.
每个短任务奖励
short_quest.tooltip2:
金块.
每 5 个短任务有一个有奖励.
解锁于 5% 已结识朋友.
short_quest.story_1: Short Quest finished:⮀ You help an elderly woman get her cat down from atop her house, she rewards you handsomely for your efforts.
short_quest.story_2: 20 Short Quests with loot in a loop:⮀ You’ve helped everyone who’s been willing to take you on, and the gold from your work jingles beautifully in your pockets. The satisfaction of a job well done fills you with pride.

investigate.label: 调查
investigate.tooltip:
你听到了一些传闻...
解锁于 25% 已结识朋友.
investigate.story_1: 20% Investigated:⮀ You catch some snippets of truly interesting gossip. Apparently a Mage and Warrior duo had stopped in and were sticking around for a little while.
investigate.story_2: 40% Investigated:⮀ People are really helpful when you help them, you're almost starting to get a reputation as a busybody around here, but it's offset in that you actually do help people.
investigate.story_3: 60% Investigated:⮀ People are generally more willing to open up if you seem like you know things, and you do know things, as you've been around here awhile now.
investigate.story_4: 80% Investigated:⮀ The villagers are all to happy to share some stories with you at this point, it doesn't hurt that you know a little about most people now and are more than willing to strike up a conversation.
investigate.story_5: 100% Investigated:⮀ You've done it, spoken to everyone in this village. Spent a loop or more on each of them, actually. You know what needs to be done, and at this point you can just go straight there. You can also engineer a situation in which the more stubborn ones will offer you a quest.

long_quest.label: 长任务
long_quest.tooltip:
成为令人印象深刻的英雄! ...在有人注视的前提下.
每个长任务奖励
long_quest.tooltip2:
金块和 1 声望.
每 5 个长任务有一个有奖励.
解锁于 10% 已调查.
long_quest.story_1: Long Quest finished:⮀ You cleared out a cellar of rats; there were at least sixty of the blighters. You were rewarded handsomely, and you got a small reputation boost to boot.
long_quest.story_2: 10 Long Quests with loot in a loop:⮀ You’ve cleared out cellars, helped build a house, collected flowers for dyes, worked in the bakery, taken out trash, and helped a seamstress finish a gift for her husband. Your reputation is spreading as the helpful courier. Everyone is at the very least willing to listen to you.

throw_party.label: 参加派对
throw_party.tooltip:
休息一下去参加社交活动.
以结识朋友的 16 倍的效果推进已结识朋友进度.
消耗 2 声望.
解锁于 30% 已调查.
throw_party.story_1: Party thrown:⮀ You announce that its your birthday and you want to throw a party. You commandeer the village square and the people necessary to make it happen. You don't have the gold but people aren't quite able to say no. You promise you'll pay it off with the money from this current job.

warrior_lessons.label: 战士课程
warrior_lessons.tooltip:
学会战斗也许很重要; 你后面的旅途还很长.
至少需要 2 声望.
在 20% 已调查解锁.
warrior_lessons.story_1: 1 Combat:⮀ You manage to track down the warrior that was staying in town, and are greeted by a small woman holding a sword almost as tall as her. She introduces herself as "Iron" and smiles politely, doesn't stop her from thoroughly trouncing you.
warrior_lessons.story_2: 100 Combat:⮀ You manage to give Iron a run for her money, but she still manages to eek out a victory, she's noticeably worn out afterwards.
warrior_lessons.story_3: 200 Combat:⮀ You push Iron to the brink of defeat and then she starts fighting dirty.
warrior_lessons.story_4: 250 Combat:⮀ You manage to finally defeat Iron, all your experience fighting her finally pays off. You feel really proud of yourself, right up until she smacks your head with her sword and demands a rematch.

mage_lessons.label: 魔法课程
mage_lessons.tooltip:
这些神秘事物把你弄得一团糟, 但也许也能帮你脱离麻烦.
至少需要 2 声望.
解锁于 20% 已调查.
mage_lessons.story_1: 1 Magic:⮀ You approach a burly man dressed in flowing robes, and ask if he would be willing to teach you some magic. The man agrees to teach you some basic cantrips if you help him out with menial tasks. He introduces himself as Warrick.
mage_lessons.story_2: 100 Magic:⮀ Warrick compliments you on your ability to wield mana, and is happy to share some more dangerous cantrips with your promise to not use it for ill. He refuses to teach you about alchemy.
mage_lessons.story_3: 200 Magic:⮀ Warrick is suspicious about your proficiency with mana for someone he's just run into in the wild, but is still more than willing to humor you. If he throws appraising glances at you every now and then, you pay them no mind.
mage_lessons.story_4: 250 Magic:⮀ You and Warrick duel, your lessons from that point on are finding an out of the way location and duking it out with magic. Warrick seems appreciative about the exertion.
mage_lessons.story_5: 10 Alchemy:⮀ You offer to help him with his alchemy work and he immdiately seems to develop a soft spot for you, talking about herbs and their effects when combined with eachother and how they build together to create mystical potions. The man's passionate, that's for sure.
mage_lessons.story_6: 50 Alchemy:⮀ You offer Warrick some alchemy techniques that he's never heard of in exchange for some more magic techniques and lessons. He agrees readily.
mage_lessons.story_7: 100 Alchemy:⮀ You offer to teach Warrick about alchemy if he teaches you about the branches of magic you have little grounding in. The man himself is a genius and has much to teach. He gives it his all, tempted by the secrets of Alchemy.

heal_the_sick.label: 治病
heal_the_sick.tooltip:
你肯定不可能全部治好, 但他们会感谢你尽力救治.
一共有 3 治疗阶段, 每个阶段都有对应的能力 - 诊断 (感知), 处理 (智力), 通知 (魅力).
每点法力给予 (魔法技能) * (治疗魔法 / 50) * (1 + 主能力 / 100) * 开方(1 + 完成次数 / 100) * (初始法力消耗 / 实际法力消耗) 进度点.
需要至少 1 声望.
解锁于 12 魔法技能.
每个治愈的病人可以让你获得 3 声望.
heal_the_sick.story_1: Patient healed:⮀ You're allowed in to see the patients and begin healing. It's excellent practice and everyone you heal, be it from broken bones to small scrapes is extraordinarily thankful for your help.
heal_the_sick.story_2: 10 Patients healed in a loop:⮀ Your reputation is absolutely sterling, you've basically cleared out the entire healing home and the nurses and healers are more than thankful for your help.
heal_the_sick.story_3: Failed Action:⮀ You're turned away at the door, the small healers home stating that they can't trust you to not poison the people inside or make the situation worse.

fight_monsters.label: 和怪物战斗
fight_monsters.tooltip:
慢慢的, 你就能摸清楚他们的战斗习惯.
战斗会有 3 种形式, 每个形式有对应的主能力 - 突袭 (速度), 防御 (力量), 进攻 (体质).
每点法力给予 (个人战斗力) * (1 + 主能力 / 100) * 开方(1 + 完成次数 / 100) * (初始法力消耗 / 实际法力消耗) 进度点.
需要至少 2 声望.
解锁于 10 战斗技能.
每个完成的战斗阶段可以让你获得 20 金块.
